body: Hey guys! I am not very popular around avicus but I am a very old player. I have played for around 2+ years now(back when the server was called skywars). So here I want to know what kind of music/instrumental stuff do you listen to while playing? (if any) If you chat with friends while playing then go ahead and comment that!<br id="null"><br id="null">What do I listen to while playing? I am a performer/actor myself so I enjoy listening to Broadway musical playlists while playing.  Some of my favorites include Finding Neverland, Hamilton, and Mama Mia. Please keep the feedback to positive and no negative comments!
body_tagged: Hey guys! I am not very popular around avicus but I am a very old player. I have played for around 2+ years now(back when the server was called skywars). So here I want to know what kind of music/instrumental stuff do you listen to while playing? (if any) If you chat with friends while playing then go ahead and comment that!<br id="null"><br id="null">What do I listen to while playing? I am a performer/actor myself so I enjoy listening to Broadway musical playlists while playing.  Some of my favorites include Finding Neverland, Hamilton, and Mama Mia. Please keep the feedback to positive and no negative comments!
title: What do you listen to while playing avicus?

replies.body:
Mostly Chill & EDM music. Witt Lowry, Luck Christopher, Raider, and Miike Snow would be the ones I listen to most.

Or I go to dubtrack.fm (or I guess plug.dj now, though I don't like how buggy it is), and listen to whatever is playing there.
replies.body_tagged:

Or I go to dubtrack.fm (or I guess plug.dj now, though I don't like how buggy it is), and listen to whatever is playing there.
